entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI TOP 1998/1. Operation and prospects of medium and big companies in Hungary.
entry.dcterms:creator: Merkl, Ildikó
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-C75: TÁRKI TOP 1998/1. Operation and prospects of medium and big companies in Hungary.. data sheet. Version: 2009-09-11

entry.dcterms:description: ownership, employment, rentability, production, operation, export turnover, import-needs, delivery and invoicing discipline, taxing, debts
entry.dcterms:subject: business/industrial management and organisation
economic systems and development
labour and employment
social stratification and groupings
economic conditions and indicators
economic organization
survey data
time-series
A random sample of companies containing the 1500 biggest production companies also exporting their products; sample based on the registry of the Hungarian Central Statistical Office (KSH).
Telephone interview with the head of the company or a person nominated by the company head.
